column1: ZW3008 Jasco 26932 In-Wall Smart Motion Dimmer

column3: 1. Changed device behavior: restart the reset cycle once motion detected (if PIR triggered, 08 sent); if continuous motion detected, the reset cycle will keep being restarted without sending an additional 08; and if no motion detected for a continuous 20s (default), 00 will be sent.
2. Fixed the notification report/GET report issues
4. Modified the operation for factory reset when parameter 19 (alternate exclusion) is set to 1
6. Fixed an issue to report Lifeline Group 1 if we GET a non-supported group
7. Modified the button press procedure for alternate exclusion and alternate factory reset
